title: Ticket Surge Tuesday
content: Handled a sudden surge in support tickets today. Mostly internet downtime reports from clients in VI. Took Dhuhr break on time, Alhamdulillah.

title: Email Server Bug
content: Spent most of the day debugging an email server misconfiguration. Finally resolved it by checking MX records. Grateful I could still make Maghrib at the mosque.

title: Early Start
content: Logged in earlier than usual. Cleared out backlog before the daily standup. Jumu'ah prep tomorrow—need to pick a clean thobe.

title: Jumu'ah Reflections
content: Went for Jumu'ah at the Central Mosque in Lagos Island. The khutbah was about patience in hardship. Really resonated after this stressful week.

title: Madrasah Lessons
content: Weekend madrasah was refreshing. Revised Surah Al-Mulk and learned some Hadith on intention. Did laundry afterwards and cleaned the kitchen.

title: Sunday Routine
content: Attended morning class at madrasah. Discussed tafsir of Surah Qalam. After that, helped mom with the shopping and swept the compound.

title: VPN Issues at Work
content: Dealt with VPN access problems for remote employees. Resolved via DNS flushing and cert renewal. Missed Asr, had to pray Qadha. Need to plan better.

title: Good Feedback
content: Got positive feedback from the manager on ticket resolution time. Feels good. Treated myself to suya and zobo for dinner.

title: Cable Chaos
content: Had to manually re-cable the server rack—sweated buckets. Skipped lunch. Took time after work to recite some Qur’an and unwind.

title: Qur’an Before Work
content: Woke up earlier than usual. Prayed Fajr and read Surah Rahman before starting work. It really set the tone for the day.

title: Power Outage Struggles
content: NEPA did their thing again. Switched to inverter and hotspot to stay online. Still closed all tickets. Alhamdulillah for resilience.

title: Madrasah Quiz
content: Had a fiqh quiz at madrasah today—did pretty well. Grateful for the ustadh’s detailed teaching. Swept and mopped the house afterwards.

title: Spiritual Sunday
content: Madrasah focused on the Seerah today—particularly the Battle of Badr. Always moving to hear it. Also fixed the kitchen tap after class.

title: Slack Notification Flood
content: Slack didn’t stop buzzing all day. Coordinated issue triage between teams. It’s tough staying productive but Alhamdulillah, I managed.

title: Career Thoughts
content: Had a long think about whether to specialize in cybersecurity. Made istikhara about it. Let’s see where Allah guides me.

title: Patience Tested
content: A very rude client today tested my patience. Recited Surah Al-Asr silently and kept my calm. Proud of myself.

title: System Downtime Firefight
content: Emergency: system outage affecting over 100 users. Was on it for hours. Resolved by 6 PM. Took time to decompress after Isha.

title: Simple Jumu’ah
content: Went to local masjid for Jumu’ah. Peaceful and quiet. The Imam’s reminder on accountability stayed with me through the day.

title: Busy Saturday
content: Cleaned the bathroom, did laundry, and still made it to madrasah. Learned about zakat distribution rules. Productive day.

title: Weekend Wrap-Up
content: Final madrasah session for the month. Studied Arabic grammar basics. Cooked jollof rice after class while listening to an Islamic podcast.

title: Going to Madrasah
content: I missed going to Madrasah today due to code writing.
